about_the_game:
A horror adventure game where a girl, who cares deeply for her best friend, searches for her friend in an aquarium turned into a world of terror. While escaping from strange beings called Creepy, you will unravel the mysteries hidden in the aquarium.

The horror elements are mild, allowing you to enjoy challenging puzzles. In addition to the protagonist, unique and charming girls will appear. The story features multiple endings that change based on your choices.

The playtime is approximately 3 hours.

This game is created with RPG Maker MZ.

Controls:

Z key: Confirm, fast forward
X key: Open menu, cancel
Arrow keys: Move character
Shift key: Dash

The game supports Japanese, Korean, and Chinese (Simplified and Traditional).

name: The Aquarium does not dance

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows® 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

short_description: This is a horror adventure game where a girl, devoted to her best friend, searches for her companion in an aquarium that has transformed into a world of horror. While evading the deformed entities known as "Creepies," the player must unravel the mysteries concealed within the aquarium.
supported_languages: Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Traditional Chinese
